info.description: Azure DocumentDB Database Service Resource Provider REST API
info.title: DocumentDB

info.description: Azure DocumentDB Database Service Resource Provider REST API
info.title: DocumentDB

apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2015-04-08.
apiVersionParameter.name: api-version

resourceGroupNameParameter.description: Name of an Azure resource group.
resourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName

head.description: Checks that the Azure DocumentDB account name already exists. A valid account name may contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and the '-' character, and must be between 3 and 50 characters.

200.description: OK. The account name is valid but is already in use.

404.description: Not Found. The account name is available and valid.

get.description: Lists all the Azure DocumentDB database accounts available under the subscription.
Lists all the Azure DocumentDB database accounts available under the given resource group.

delete.description: Deletes an existing Azure DocumentDB database account.

202.description: The database account delete operation will complete asynchronously.

204.description: The specified account does not exist in the subscription.

get.description: Retrieves the properties of an existing Azure DocumentDB database account.

200.description: The database account properties were retrieved successfully.

patch.description: Patches the properties of an existing Azure DocumentDB database account.

parameters.description: The tags parameter to patch for the current database account.
parameters.name: updateParameters

200.description: The properties of the database account were patched successfully.

put.description: Creates or updates an Azure DocumentDB database account.

parameters.description: The parameters to provide for the current database account.
parameters.name: createUpdateParameters

200.description: The database account create or update operation will complete asynchronously.

post.description: Changes the failover priority for the Azure DocumentDB database account. A failover priority of 0 indicates a write region. The maximum value for a failover priority = (total number of regions - 1). Failover priority values must be unique for each of the regions in which the database account exists.

parameters.description: The new failover policies for the database account.
parameters.name: failoverParameters

202.description: Accepted. The failover policy change operation will complete asynchronously.

post.description: Lists the access keys for the specified Azure DocumentDB database account.

get.description: Lists the read-only access keys for the specified Azure DocumentDB database account.

post.description: Regenerates an access key for the specified Azure DocumentDB database account.

parameters.description: The name of the key to regenerate.
parameters.name: keyToRegenerate

202.description: Accepted. The regenerate key operation will complete asynchronously.

ConsistencyPolicy.description: The consistency policy for the DocumentDB database account.

defaultConsistencyLevel.description: The default consistency level and configuration settings of the DocumentDB account.

maxIntervalInSeconds.description: When used with the Bounded Staleness consistency level, this value represents the time amount of staleness (in seconds) tolerated. Accepted range for this value is 1 - 100. Required when defaultConsistencyPolicy is set to 'BoundedStaleness'.

maxStalenessPrefix.description: When used with the Bounded Staleness consistency level, this value represents the number of stale requests tolerated. Accepted range for this value is 1 – 2,147,483,647. Required when defaultConsistencyPolicy is set to 'BoundedStaleness'.

kind.description: Indicates the type of database account. This can only be set at database account creation.

DatabaseAccountCreateUpdateParameters.description: Parameters to create and update DocumentDB database accounts.

DatabaseAccountCreateUpdateProperties.description: Properties to create and update Azure DocumentDB database accounts.

consistencyPolicy.description: The consistency policy for the DocumentDB account.

ipRangeFilter.description: DocumentDB Firewall Support: This value specifies the set of IP addresses or IP address ranges in CIDR form to be included as the allowed list of client IPs for a given database account. IP addresses/ranges must be comma separated and must not contain any spaces.

locations.description: An array that contains the georeplication locations enabled for the DocumentDB account.

DatabaseAccountListKeysResult.description: The access keys for the given database account.

primaryMasterKey.description: Base 64 encoded value of the primary read-write key.

secondaryMasterKey.description: Base 64 encoded value of the secondary read-write key.

DatabaseAccountListReadOnlyKeysResult.description: The read-only access keys for the given database account.

primaryReadonlyMasterKey.description: Base 64 encoded value of the primary read-only key.

secondaryReadonlyMasterKey.description: Base 64 encoded value of the secondary read-only key.

DatabaseAccountOfferType.description: The offer type for the DocumentDB database account.

DatabaseAccountPatchParameters.description: Parameters for patching Azure DocumentDB database account properties.

consistencyPolicy.description: The consistency policy for the DocumentDB database account.

databaseAccountOfferType.description: The offer type for the DocumentDB database account. Default value: Standard.

documentEndpoint.description: The connection endpoint for the DocumentDB database account.

failoverPolicies.description: An array that contains the regions ordered by their failover priorities.

ipRangeFilter.description: DocumentDB Firewall Support: This value specifies the set of IP addresses or IP address ranges in CIDR form to be included as the allowed list of client IPs for a given database account. IP addresses/ranges must be comma separated and must not contain any spaces.

readLocations.description: An array that contains of the read locations enabled for the DocumentDB account.

writeLocations.description: An array that contains the write location for the DocumentDB account.

DatabaseAccountRegenerateKeyParameters.description: Parameters to regenerate the keys within the database account.

DatabaseAccountsListResult.description: The List operation response, that contains the database accounts and their properties.

value.description: List of database account and their properties.

FailoverPolicies.description: The list of new failover policies for the failover priority change.

FailoverPolicy.description: The failover policy for a given region of a database account.

failoverPriority.description: The failover priority of the region. A failover priority of 0 indicates a write region. The maximum value for a failover priority = (total number of regions - 1). Failover priority values must be unique for each of the regions in which the database account exists.

id.description: The unique identifier of the region in which the database account replicates to. Example: <accountName>-<locationName>.

locationName.description: The name of the region in which the database account exists.

IPRangeFilter.description: DocumentDB Firewall Support: This value specifies the set of IP addresses or IP address ranges in CIDR form to be included as the allowed list of client IPs for a given database account. IP addresses/ranges must be comma separated and must not contain any spaces.

Location.description: A region in which the Azure DocumentDB database account is deployed.

documentEndpoint.description: The connection endpoint for the specific region. Example: https://<accountName>-<locationName>.documents.azure.com:443/

failoverPriority.description: The failover priority of the region. A failover priority of 0 indicates a write region. The maximum value for a failover priority = (total number of regions - 1). Failover priority values must be unique for each of the regions in which the database account exists.

id.description: The unique identifier of the region within the database account. Example: <accountName>-<locationName>.

ProvisioningState.description: The status of the DocumentDB account at the time the operation was called. The status can be one of following. 'Creating' – the DocumentDB account is being created. When an account is in Creating state, only properties that are specified as input for the Create DocumentDB account operation are returned. 'Succeeded' – the DocumentDB account is active for use. 'Updating' – the DocumentDB account is being updated. 'Deleting' – the DocumentDB account is being deleted. 'Failed' – the DocumentDB account failed creation.

id.description: The unique resource identifier of the database account.

location.description: The location of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

name.description: The name of the database account.

Tags.description: Tags are a list of key-value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups). A maximum of 15 tags can be provided for a resource. Each tag must have a key no greater than 128 characters and value no greater than 256 characters.
